channel.title: Shilo-Nation 317 NEW Ownership
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i60.tinypic.com/2aht752.png[/img][/center]
[center][size=24pt][b]Welcome[/b][/size][/center] [center][size=24pt][url=Http://Shilo-Nation.com]Http://Shilo-Nation.com[/url][/size][/center] [center][size=14pt]Joining is quick and easy![/size][/center]
I'd like to welcome you all to a old time favorite 317 server, Shilo-nation. We ran huge number's of player's and high activity until the previous owner became busy with his outside life. Sam has finally taken the server over with me, Zack as the Co-owner. We have high expectations for our server and simply want what you the players want! We love suggestions and take every thought into consideration.
Come join our team, our highly professional staff are here to make this server worth sticking around for, as if our fully functioning skills and pking won't ;) :D
[center][b][size=24pt]Server Features[/size][/b][/center]
-[b]All Skills are Fully Functioning, Pking and PVM of course too![/b] - Full and flawless dicing and gambling! - Full and flawless staking at the Duel Arena! - Full and flawless Bank PIN system to keep your items safe! - Fully operatable Grand Exchange! - First ever fully flawless operational Drop Party Room! - Proper combat, hybriding suppot with F-Keys! - New and updated items always being added such as handcannons, and chaotic staffs! - Lottery, win big or go home! - Perfected name changing system! - Perfected donator crown changing, with tons of options! - Loyalty titles, pre-set and custom titles! - Custom stores such as PvP Stores, Slayer Stores, and Donor Stores! - Proper curse prayers! - Tutorial on login to easily orient yourself! - Proper clue scrolls and full puzzle boxes! - Proper item effects and special attacks! - Proper banking with new banking features such as live searching and a money bag! - Great and stable economy, promising an enjoyable playing experience! - Perfectly accurate leaderboards so you can always track your progress. - Great PvP and PvM on both of our worlds with tons of challenges! - Great community with a full website and forums to ensure you're never alone! - Summoning skill 100% working -And So much more!!
[center][img]http://i59.tinypic.com/tan0uh.gif[/img][/center] [center][size=24pt][b]All Skills Including Hunter and Summoning[/b][/size][/center] [center][IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/ftea9g.png[/img][/center] [center][IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/23rwvv5.png[/img][/center] [center] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/1548uih.png[/img] [/center] [center][b][size=24pt]Fully Functioning Mini Games[/size][/b][/center] [center][img]http://i61.tinypic.com/2mfagjk.png[/img][/center] [center][b][size=24pt]Plenty of bossing to keep you busy[/size][/b][/center] [center][img]http://i58.tinypic.com/200toy9.png[/img][/center] [center][img]http://i57.tinypic.com/eqe4g2.png[/img][/center] [center][img]http://i58.tinypic.com/an2djp.png[/img] [/center] [center][IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/20pdbvs.png[/img] [/center] [center][size=24pt][b] Flawless Drop Party Room! [/center][/b] [/size] [center] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/fepbw5.png[/img] [/center] [center] New donor Only zone with Donor only cash shop! [img]http://i58.tinypic.com/t6th0n.png[/img][/center]

item.title: Shilo-Nation 317 NEW Ownership
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

[quote=“Shilo-Nation, post:6, topic:551354”]The donor store items that are allowed in pop are not overpowered, but it does contain a few items that are overpowered slightly by 20% aprox, they are only usable on npc, when attempting to us on a character the items stats reduce temporarily to 0.

But thanks for making a presumptious post about a server you didn’t even bother to fact check :D[/quote]
No problem! And if that is the case then I apologise, 99.99% of servers up now only are interested in making a quick buck or two. It is good to see you have things under control!

Read full topic

item.title: Shilo-Nation 317 NEW Ownership
item.dc:creator: @Shilo-Nation Shilo-Nation
item.description:
@Shilo-Nation wrote:

The donor store items that are allowed in pvp are not overpowered, but it does contain a few items that are overpowered slightly by 20% aprox, they are only usable on npc, when attempting to us on a character the items stats reduce temporarily to 0.

But thanks for making a presumptious post about a server you didn’t even bother to fact check

Read full topic

item.title: Shilo-Nation 317 NEW Ownership
item.dc:creator: @Zackwins Zackwins
item.description:
@Zackwins wrote:

[center][/center]

[center][size=24pt]Welcome[/size][/center]
[center][size=24pt]Http://Shilo-Nation.com[/size][/center]
[center][size=14pt]Joining is quick and easy![/size][/center]

I’d like to welcome you all to a old time favorite 317 server, Shilo-nation. We ran huge number’s of player’s
and high activity until the previous owner became busy with his outside life. Sam has finally taken the server over
with me, Zack as the Co-owner. We have high expectations for our server and simply want what you the players want!
We love suggestions and take every thought into consideration.

Come join our team, our highly professional staff are here to make this server worth sticking around for,
as if our fully functioning skills and pking won’t

[center][size=24pt]Server Features[/size][/center]

-All Skills are Fully Functioning, Pking and PVM of course too!

  • Full and flawless dicing and gambling!
  • Full and flawless staking at the Duel Arena!
  • Full and flawless Bank PIN system to keep your items safe!
  • Fully operatable Grand Exchange!
  • First ever fully flawless operational Drop Party Room!
  • Proper combat, hybriding suppot with F-Keys!
  • New and updated items always being added such as handcannons, and chaotic staffs!
  • Lottery, win big or go home!
  • Perfected name changing system!
  • Perfected donator crown changing, with tons of options!
  • Loyalty titles, pre-set and custom titles!
  • Custom stores such as PvP Stores, Slayer Stores, and Donor Stores!
  • Proper curse prayers!
  • Tutorial on login to easily orient yourself!
  • Proper clue scrolls and full puzzle boxes!
  • Proper item effects and special attacks!
  • Proper banking with new banking features such as live searching and a money bag!
  • Great and stable economy, promising an enjoyable playing experience!
  • Perfectly accurate leaderboards so you can always track your progress.
  • Great PvP and PvM on both of our worlds with tons of challenges!
  • Great community with a full website and forums to ensure you’re never alone!
  • Summoning skill 100% working
    -And So much more!!

[center][size=24pt]All Skills Including Hunter and Summoning[/size][/center]
